name: Deserted Island (Prototype)
description: Welcome to Deserted Island this is in a prototype to see if you guys like it! Your stranded on a Strang Island Your mission in the game is to build a house a sustain yourself! Crush Rocks Chop Trees and Craft build a mini hut or go big to making something huge! Please Note that things are going to change for future I am working on Farms, Bigger Island, and more audio for the game! Once you buy this game you will get the rest of the updates free! *CONTROLS* Q to drop left click to Hit TAB to open inventory WASD to move space to jump! and F to place Items!
